TopicTitle: Insufficient resource abundance - need at least 2.5%

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I'm getting this message when trying to start a "Drill-O-Matic Junior".

Is this a new requirement now? Couldn't find anything in the changelog.

Thanks.

nevermind.. it is on the drill description..

AFAIK, the Drill-O-Matic Jr. was only introduced with the last release.

The large drill does not have this limitation.

Happy landings!
